title: Ada and Scarecrow
text:
As you might already know, Ada the Ladybug is a farmer. She has multiple farmhouses and some fields which always connect two adjacent farmhouses. She plans to buy some scarecrows to scare crows!A scarecrow placed on a farmhouse scares all crows from all adjacent fields. A crow on a field can be disastrous, so Ada has to arrange the scarecrows in such way that they cover all the fields. As scarecrows are pretty expensive she wants to minimize the number of them. Can you count it for her?Note:Even thought it might look like that from description, the formed "graph" doesn't have to be planar!
